Member Function Documentation

virtual IBillboard* glr::models::IBillboardManager::createBillboard ( const std::string &  name,
glw::IMesh *  mesh,
glw::ITexture *  texture,
glw::IMaterial *  material 
)
pure virtual

Creates a billboard with name 'name' and the corresponding mesh, texture, and material data.

Note that the name does not have to be unique, but if it isn't, searching for the billboard by name will not work as expected.

Parameters
nameThe name to give the new IBillboard object.
meshThe mesh to use for the new IBillboard object.
textureThe texture to use for the new IBillboard object.
materialThe material to use for the new IBillboard object.
Returns
A pointer to an IBillboard object.

Implemented in glr::models::BillboardManager.

virtual void glr::models::IBillboardManager::destroyBillboard ( Id  id)
pure virtual

Destroys the IBillboard object with id 'id'. Any pointers or references to this billboard will become defunct.

If no IBillboard object is found with id 'id', this method does nothing.

Parameters
idThe id of the IBillboard you want to destroy.

Implemented in glr::models::BillboardManager.

virtual void glr::models::IBillboardManager::destroyBillboard ( const std::string &  name)
pure virtual

Destroys the IBillboard object with name 'name'. Any pointers or references to this billboard will become defunct.

If an IBillboard object with name 'name' is not found, this method does nothing.

If you have created billboards with duplicate names, this method will destroy the first instance of an IBillboard object it can find with a name that matches the 'name' parameter passed in. Note that there is no guarantee in which order this method will search the IBillboard objects.

Parameters
nameThe name of the IBillboard you want to destroy.

Implemented in glr::models::BillboardManager.

virtual void glr::models::IBillboardManager::destroyBillboard ( IBillboard *  billboard)
pure virtual

Destroys the the IBillboard object 'billboard'. Any pointers or references to this billboard will become defunct.

If no IBillboard is found that points to the IBillboard passed in, this method does nothing.

Parameters
modelA pointer to the IBillboard you want to destroy.

Implemented in glr::models::BillboardManager.

virtual IBillboard* glr::models::IBillboardManager::getBillboard ( Id  id) const
pure virtual

Returns a pointer to an IBillboard object that has id 'id'. If an IBillboard object with id 'id' is not found, this method returns nullptr.

Parameters
idThe id of the IBillboard template you want to get.
Returns
The raw pointer to an IBillboard object, or nullptr if it was not found.

Implemented in glr::models::BillboardManager.

virtual IBillboard* glr::models::IBillboardManager::getBillboard ( const std::string &  name) const
pure virtual

Returns a pointer to an IBillboard object that has name 'name'. If an IBillboard object with name 'name' is not found, this method returns nullptr.

If you have created billboards with duplicate names, this method will return the first instance of an IBillboard object it can find with a name that matches the 'name' parameter passed in. Note that there is no guarantee in which order this method will search the IBillboard objects.

Parameters
nameThe name of the IBillboard template you want to get.
Returns
The raw pointer to an IBillboard object, or nullptr if it was not found.

Implemented in glr::models::BillboardManager.
